rules_text: Whenever a creature mounts Zane, that creature deals damage equal to its power to any target.
special_text:
Mount {2}{R}{G} [i](Put this under target creature you own without a mount until it leaves the battlefield. It gains all abilities, counters, and base power and toughness from this. Mount only as a sorcery.)[/i]
Whenever a creature mounts Zane, that creature deals damage equal to its power to any target.
